# Autumnal Aurora
## Scripture
"For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations." - Psalm 100:5

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the autumnal sky, we're met with the breathtaking display of the Northern Lights. The dancing aurora borealis is a testament to God's majesty and faithfulness. Just as the aurora's colors shift and change, our lives are filled with seasons of transition and transformation. Yet, in the midst of uncertainty, we can rely on God's unwavering love and faithfulness. The Northern Lights remind us that God's promises are not bound by the changing seasons, but endure forever.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the beauty of the Northern Lights, we're reminded of your eternal faithfulness. Help us to trust in your goodness and love, even in the midst of life's uncertainties. May the shimmering curtains of the aurora borealis inspire us to fix our eyes on your unchanging nature, and may our hearts be filled with gratitude for your enduring love. As we navigate the changing seasons of life, may we cling to your promises and bask in the radiant glory of your presence. Amen.
